article_title: The Morning Download: IBM Moves to Counteract Collaboration on Dark Web
article_text:
International Business Machines Corp. Security Analyst Etay Maor Steve Rosenbush/WSJ

“If two hours after launching an attack on a bank every financial service around the world has your IP or malware identified, the attack is just not going to be worth the time and effort,” IBM Security Analyst Etay Maor tells CIO Journal. “We have to collaborate to beat these criminals at their own game.”
